environment: Operation Temp: 0 to 45 degrees C Operation Humidity: 20 to 85% non-condensing Storage Temp: -15 to 60 degrees C Storage Humidity: 0 to 90% non-condensing
resetbutton: Push and hold over 5 seconds will Factory Reset
supportedprotocols: TCP/IP, UDP, ICMP, DHCP, NTP, DNS, DDNS, SMTP, FTP, HTTP, HTTPs, Samba, PPPoE, UPnP, Bonjour, RTP, RTSP, RTCP
audioout: External audio output to active speaker Mono
ethernet: One RJ45 port;IEEE 802.3u compliant 10/100 Mbps Fast Ethernet with Auto-MDIX
